Configuration Next Steps

Although the Setup Wizard automatically configures the device, we suggest customizing some settings to provide better security and performance:

 • If you already have a DHCP server on your network and you do not want the device to act as a network DHCP server, disable the server. See Configuring LAN Settings.

 • To configure your Virtual Private Network (VPN), see Configuring VPN.

 • Your device supports up to four wireless networks. You can only set up one wireless network (or SSID) by using the Setup Wizard. To configure additional wireless networks, use web-based Device Manager. See Configuring Wireless Networks.
